security.title: Secure Blockchain Wallet Management
security.subtitle: Your workflows can create and manage blockchain wallets with enterprise-grade security powered by thirdweb Vault SDK and AWS Nitro Enclaves.

vault.title: What is thirdweb Vault?
vault.description: thirdweb Vault is a secure key management system that allows your workflows to create and control blockchain wallets for automated operations - like a robot that can sign transactions on your behalf.

features.title: Create Wallets in Workflows
features.description: Your automation workflows can create dedicated blockchain wallets for specific tasks (trading bots, NFT minting, etc.)

features.title: Sign Transactions Automatically
features.description: Workflows can sign blockchain transactions, messages, and smart contract calls without manual approval

features.title: Multi-Chain Support
features.description: Works across all 35+ supported blockchain networks - Ethereum, Polygon, Base, Arbitrum, and more

features.title: You Stay in Control
features.description: Only you can access and manage your workflow wallets - they're tied to your account

nitro.title: AWS Nitro Enclaves
nitro.description: Private keys are stored in AWS Nitro Enclaves - isolated, hardware-protected environments that even AWS administrators cannot access.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: All communication with vault wallets uses xChaCha20-Poly1305 encryption with perfect forward secrecy.
features: Private keys never leave the enclave
Encrypted at rest and in transit

hero.title: Building the Future of
hero.description: FrostyLabs is on a mission to democratize AI automation and make blockchain technology accessible to everyone. We're building the tools that will power the next generation of automated workflows.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: We believe that AI automation should be accessible, secure, and truly decentralized. Our mission is to democratize AI workflow automation by combining the power of multiple AI models with the security and ownership benefits of blockchain technology.
mission.paragraph2: Through NFT-based subscriptions, we're creating a new paradigm where users truly own their access rights, can trade them freely, and benefit from the value they create in the ecosystem.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where AI automation is as accessible and tradable as any digital asset, where users control their own destiny, and where the power of artificial intelligence is harnessed by everyone, not just large corporations.

techStack.title: Technology Stack
techStack.subtitle: Built with cutting-edge technologies for maximum performance, security, and scalability.

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Our journey to revolutionize AI automation and blockchain integration.

community.title: Join Our Community

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about FrostyLabs

items.question: What is FrostyLabs?
items.answer: FrostyLabs is building the future of AI automation with two flagship products: FrostyFlow‚Äîa no-code AI agent platform for Web3 and beyond, and FrostyDAO‚Äîa decentralized community governing the ecosystem. Create powerful workflows for crypto research, DeFi operations, NFT minting, DAO governance, or even non-blockchain tasks like data analysis and content creation.

items.question: Do I need coding experience to use FrostyFlow?
items.answer: No! FrostyFlow is designed to be fully no-code. Our visual workflow builder and AI-powered natural language interface let you create sophisticated automation without writing a single line of code.

items.question: Which blockchain networks are supported?
items.answer: We support 35+ networks including Ethereum, Polygon, Base, Arbitrum, Optimism, BSC, Avalanche, and more. Full multi-chain support for Solana, Cosmos, and Polkadot coming in Q3 2026.

items.question: What AI models does FrostyLabs use?
items.answer: We integrate with the best AI models including GPT-4, GPT-5, Claude 4.5 Sonnet, Gemini 2.0 Flash, and DeepSeek. Pro users get access to premium models. We're also adding support for Nebula AI, ThirdWeb's proprietary model optimized for Web3 operations.

items.question: Is my wallet safe? Do I need crypto to get started?
items.answer: Your security is paramount. We use ThirdWeb's in-app wallet technology and Vault SDK for enterprise-grade security‚Äîyour private keys are never exposed or stored on our servers. Sign up easily with email and pay with credit card to mint your subscription NFT. No crypto wallet or tokens required to start! For advanced users, we support MetaMask, WalletConnect, and other Web3 wallets. SOC 2 compliant with regular security audits.

items.question: What's included in the Beta Founder program?
items.answer: Beta Founders get: (1) First month free on Pro tier, (2) Exclusive Beta Founder NFT badge, (3) Auto-whitelist for $FROST token fair launch, (4) Eligibility for DAO treasury multisig, (5) Lifetime early adopter benefits on all FrostyDAO products.

items.question: What is $FROST and how does it work?
items.answer: $FROST is FrostyDAO's utility token, launching Q2 2026. Stake $FROST to earn FTGOV (governance tokens) and receive revenue share from DAO operations. Use $FROST for payments, marketplace transactions, and governance voting. Fair launch with Beta Founders auto-whitelisted.

items.question: How does FrostyDAO governance work?
items.answer: Stake $FROST to earn FTGOV tokens, which give you voting power. Vote on treasury allocation, feature development, partnerships, and DAO operations. The DAO controls 95% of subscription revenue and uses FrostyFlow to automate treasury management and DeFi strategies.

items.question: Can FrostyFlow automate DeFi trading?
items.answer: Yes! Create workflows that monitor prices, execute trades on DEXs, manage liquidity positions, harvest yields, and more. Our AI agents can analyze market conditions and execute complex DeFi strategies automatically.

items.question: How is FrostyFlow different from Zapier or Make?
items.answer: FrostyFlow combines the best of both worlds: powerful Web3-native integrations AND traditional automation. Unlike Zapier or Make, we offer blockchain-specific tools (token analysis, DeFi operations, security audits) powered by advanced AI that can make autonomous decisions. Plus, you can build autonomous AI agents, not just simple workflows. And yes‚Äîyou can also automate non-blockchain tasks like any other platform!

items.question: What pricing plans are available?
items.answer: Free tier: 50 AI calls/month with basic features. Pro ($25/mo): 500 AI calls, premium AI models, 50 workflows. Enterprise ($99/mo): Unlimited workflows, 2000 AI calls, multi-agent coordination. Beta users get first month free on any tier.

items.question: Can I build and sell my own AI agents?
items.answer: Yes! Our Agent Marketplace (launching Q4 2026) lets creators build, publish, and monetize custom agents and workflow templates. Earn revenue share in $FROST. DAO also offers grants for innovative agent development.
